original:
The sugar industry in China has finally stabilized after several years of turbulence, bringing a sigh of relief to executives and traders alike. The market has enjoyed a more steady and comfortable run in recent months, aided in part by the country's recent decision to stop imports of high fructose corn syrup.
This move by the Chinese government has been critically important to the sugar industry,
sampled:
The sugar industry in China has finally stabilized after several years in turbulence, bringing a sigh of tranquility to executives and traders alike. The market has enjoyed a more steady and comfortable run in recent months, aided in part of the country's recent decision to stop imports of high fructose syrup treacle.
This move by the Chinese government has been critically important to the sugar industry,
